title: Most important export partner countries for Brazil in 2017
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories for the x axis representing Country, and a y axis representing Share in total export.
The highest category is found at China where Share in total export is 21.8.
The lowest category is found at Netherlands where Share in total export is 4.3.
gold: This statistic shows the most important export partner countries for Brazil in 2017 . In 20167 the main export partner country of Brazil was China with a share of 21.8 percent in exports .
